website_summaries.verdict: A piece of construction equipment that offers hours of fun for kids.
pros: Innovative toy keeps kids' minds engaged while providing a fun, physical activity
Customers reports kids from ages 4 to 7 can use this toy
Easy to assemble for instant fun in the sand
Folds up so it's easy to store
cons: May require some replacement pieces for stability

customer_reviews.title: Keeps breaking... such a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sons 5th birthday. He was SO happy to play with it, he LOVES sand boxes. But it kept breaking everytime he scooped up a pile of sand... the bolt connecting the two sides broke off and all the pieces fell in the sand. It happened so many times I gave up on connecting the bolts. I tried calling the company but no one called back and it's too late to return. Sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Ebby Rylant

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for kids and can be easily moved if ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friends son and he loves it. Perfect size for kids and can be easily moved if need be. Very durable and sturdy. It was shipped quickly although it didn't come in another box, so if this is suppose to be a surprise make sure to grab it before anyone sees it. The box was a little smashed in the one corner but the stuff inside was in perfect condition so no harm.
customer_reviews.author: chelsea a

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, will see if it lasts! Gave to ...
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy, will see if it lasts! Gave to my 4 year son this morning, already bolt that everyone mentions has loosened and fallen out. But the metal is weak, if not digging in sand or soft surface, my son bent the metal a few times while attempting to dig on the grass. The shovel is down and ready, he continues to try to dig and pull up, it bends. Not sure if keeping yet. Not sure it would last 30 days 😂
customer_reviews.author: renee

customer_reviews.title: This is well made. My husband had to make ...
customer_reviews.text: This is well made. My husband had to make the holes for the seat bigger as the screws were not fitting in (something I could have not done on my own). My seven year old son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Low price easy assembly fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Son and every kid in the family and neighborhood play on this. It's holding up. Bought 6m ago in rainy fl. It holds up. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: it’s holding up fine.
customer_reviews.text: The hardware did not hold up, but after replacing with higher quality stainless steel pieces, it’s holding up fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tuneup

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: Love that this toy can be moved and does not have to be bolted to the ground. Great for a toddler sandbox!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S. Berens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for a two year old. He loves it and uses it almost daily (when weather allows).
customer_reviews.author: ms

customer_reviews.title: Small child approved
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my cousin, and he immediately was a fan of it. I highly recommend following the instructions presented by other reviewers about replacing the bolt with a higher quality one.
customer_reviews.author: CRD

customer_reviews.title: 3y.o. Loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Buy a real self locking nut at the hardware store for the joint between the two levers. Other than that my only regret is not buying two! Loads of digging going on at our house! Easy to assemble also
customer_reviews.author: M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves this toy! Not the highest quality but he likes it enough for his sandbox.
customer_reviews.author: Imabanana

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift for my 4 yo grandson. And he loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old grandson loves this back hoe toy. At first I didn't think it was going to hold up but so far he hasn't been able to break it! We made him a 4x4 sand box with 10 bags of play sand from Lowes and he digs way past the play sand.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Riveiro

customer_reviews.title: hours of fun for my grandson
customer_reviews.text: my grandson loves this, he loves digging in the sand with it..I think it's cool that the bucket can be mounted to scoop toward him or away
customer_reviews.author: GunNut37086

customer_reviews.title: but the manufacturer was super quick about getting them out to me
customer_reviews.text: it was missing parts, but the manufacturer was super quick about getting them out to me, my son loves this beast!!!
customer_reviews.author: david forsberg

customer_reviews.title: Great product! The nut & bolt holding the folding ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! The nut & bolt holding the folding arm together kept getting loose & would fall off, and eventually we lost the washer & bolt, but I rigged a replacement from things we had, so it works.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Loose bolts
customer_reviews.text: Awesome toy? But it comes apart to easily! After my son has played on it for an hour or two, you need to tighten the bolt or it will fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Lee

customer_reviews.title: OKAY
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves it, but I wish it was built a little better. I am afraid it is too light weight and will not last as long as I would hope. I guess you get what you pay for!!
customer_reviews.author: Alaska Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Grandbabies wore them out
customer_reviews.text: We bought for the grandbabies and they literally wore them out
customer_reviews.author: Janis

customer_reviews.title: Super fun toy
customer_reviews.text: Super fun toy! Great for my 2yr old and 6yr old! The metal is thin, so it will bend if forced to dig in packed sand. Very happy w this toy!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: very cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in the quality of this digger. Within 10 days I have had to replace all the bolts and the arm has bent. Definitely do not purchase this digger. The old red ones lasted so much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila W.

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: Hours of fun. Got this for my grandson, we have one and wanted one of his own. It keeps him occupied for hours.
customer_reviews.author: JDF

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and actually grabs things in the claw bucket
customer_reviews.text: My six year old LOVES this so much!! Sturdy and actually grabs things in the claw bucket. He isnt exactly gentle with it and it is still upholding and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: jodilynne

customer_reviews.title: Our boys love this! It's the perfect size for them and ...
customer_reviews.text: Our boys love this! It's the perfect size for them and is steady and able to be used. We cut up pool noodles to make easy to scoop "boulders" and they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Conowitch

customer_reviews.title: My three year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My three year old LOVES this! He gets so excited to play with it and he wants to show it to everyone who comes over. It was a huge hit for Christmas! It is very sturdy and easy for him to operate. I would highly suggest it for boys of this age group.
customer_reviews.author: boobear

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this toy! We got rid of our sandbox because our son loves to play with this in a sand pile we have. It sits outside all the time and is still in good condition. The seat and handles have faded a bit from the sun, but that's no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: bkgilbert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This digger is perfect for any kid. But a must have for boys. Perfect toy at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: C. Morales

customer_reviews.title: Great digger!
customer_reviews.text: Well made. I believe it will last a long time. The action is smooth and fun.
customer_reviews.author: ValerieMFT

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Our son loves diggers, and this is a great addition to his sandbox.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Not very sturdy. Bought two & both digger attachments came off within two weeks time. Bolts were lost. My husband bought more bolts & repaired. Hope they last longer this time.
customer_reviews.author: jdmommy

customer_reviews.title: Looking forward to warm weather so can use this in ...
customer_reviews.text: Looking forward to warm weather so can use this in the sand box. Looks as described, and was here on time.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend, well made
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my 4yr old grandson..he absolutely LOVES it and uses it as much as he can when he's visiting. Highly recommend, well made, easy to assemble and well priced
customer_reviews.author: Heather M. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Save your self some trouble and buy some extra washers and screws.
customer_reviews.text: In less than ten minutes of my boys using it, the screws loosen up and have to be tightened before it falls apart. After does this three times in less than an hour, I think some adjustments need to be made to this toy...
customer_reviews.author: Angele

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love it
customer_reviews.text: Even though it took a few extra days for delivery, it’s a great toy for our grandkids sandbox.
customer_reviews.author: Selina ramirez

customer_reviews.title: easy to move
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this! easy to move. not heavy at all. he can't wait to take it to the beach!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M

customer_reviews.title: fun times
customer_reviews.text: Great fun- the nuts and bolts fell out a few time, but thankfully each time we've been able to find them and re-tighten!
customer_reviews.author: BKB2004

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We now have two of these and my kids love them!
customer_reviews.author: Ksage

customer_reviews.title: Toy was great, 3 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: Toy was great, 3 year old loves it. The only reason I'm not giving 5 stars is because upon arrival in the mail the plastic seat was chipped.
customer_reviews.author: ebabydeer

customer_reviews.title: but quality could be better. Bolts are always needing to be tightened
customer_reviews.text: Son loves it, but quality could be better. Bolts are always needing to be tightened.
customer_reviews.author: D. Brickner

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Worked ok for a few weeks. There is a problem in the design though. Every time the shovel is moved back and forth, the bolt attaching it moves a little. So it falls apart in the middle joint during every use. The only way to prevent this was to add a few additional lock nuts, but still requires tightening. This reduces the movement on the bolt some. Overall just a flimsy design, but works ok if you don't mind putting it back together every so often.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son's 3rd bday. He loves it. Easy to assemble for parents and easy to operate for my boy. He loves moving sand.
customer_reviews.author: paulat

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a child that likes excavators.
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for a little boy that loves excavators! It was easy to put together and seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: It broke the first day my three year old played with it. very disappointing birthday gift needless to say
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Webber

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: He just turned 3 yrs old and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua A. Wapner

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Cool product for a small kid. Max age should be 6 or less.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Willett

customer_reviews.title: Great for older, heavier kids
customer_reviews.text: Love that this one works for kids up to 110 pounds when most sand diggers hold a max of 70 pounds (or so.) We have it outside in our large sandbox and the kids love it. I agree with previous reviews that it's not the most sturdy - we've had to make a few adjustments - and that's the only reason why I'm not giving it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. Very easy assembly(easier than it looks). Love that it spins around. Very very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: melissa wade

customer_reviews.title: He loved the the toy and it was fun watching hi
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my 3 year old nephew. He was able to sit down on it right away and started playing with it. We gave it to him in the winter so we saved a big box of packing peanuts for him to scoop up and move around since it was to cold to use it outside. He loved the the toy and it was fun watching hi. Play with it. Regarding the toy construction, the material is a little weak but it should hold up to a fair amount of use.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: My son managed to bed his fairly easily, and he's only six
customer_reviews.text: This is ok, but be warned that the metal on the arm isn't very thick. My son managed to bed his fairly easily, and he's only six. Granted he tried to dig in packed dirt rather than soft sand, but I was still surprised to see how easily it bent. I bent it back in shape and braced it with a scrap of wood and it seems to be doing fine since. Just be warned, this is designed for use in play sand and is not a rugged digger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But he will love this once he is
customer_reviews.text: I thought my 18 month old would be big enough for this toy, but due to the back not having support or straps to hold him in, we will have to wait till he's older, bigger and sturdier. But he will love this once he is!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica I. Salerno

customer_reviews.title: my kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 3 year old son this Christmas and both he and my 6 year old daughter couldn't wait for me to finish assembling it to try it out. They play with it all the time. Our oldest is 11 and she even gets in the sandbox to play on this! definitely worth the price too!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: not the best
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my 2yr old, but when my 4 and 7yr old usr them they bend out of shape and you can't dig. They need to use a thicker metal and it would be great !
customer_reviews.author: gthreemama

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My five year old grandson loves it. Here's praying it continues to hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Lyne Soulia

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to add to a newly built sandbox for my daughter's 5th birthday. She thoroughly enjoyed it the day of with her little brother, then the next day I hear screaming because the articulating arm fell off. I could not even find the bolt to reassemble, didn't have the box to return. Now being used as a stool. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Arthureaux

customer_reviews.title: BEST BOY TOY EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my nephew for Christmas while on a flash sale but totally would’ve paid full price for it. Soo worth it. It was so easy to put together. It took less than 20 minutes. He wanted on it immediately and was able to figure out how to swivel it and work the levers easily.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

product_meta.title: Alex Active Play Super Sand Digger Kids Outdoor Activity
product_meta.description: ALEX Toys Active Play Super Sand Digger lets you move mountains of sand! Control the levers, pivot, dump and scoop just like a real construction worker! The molded hand grips are sized perfectly for little hands to grip the controls and operate this ‘big rig’ and the contoured seat, pivots a full 360 degrees. The Super Sand Digger is sturdy, lightweight and folds up for easy storage and portability, so whether the job is in the sand box or on the beach you’re ready to play! For kids up to 110 lbs./50kg. Adult assembly required. Recommended for children 4 years of age and older.
feature_bullets: Be like a real construction worker with this ride on crane
Creative Child Awards, Top Toy of the Year
Includes a digging shovel, dual hand controls, contoured pivoting seat and wide base
Recommended for children 4 years of age and older

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars191 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
